title: S2 Ep53: The Rich History of Rolling Hills Sanitorium - Hr.1

description: Lori Carlson joins Darkness Radio to give us the lowdown on Rolling Hills Sanitorium in Upstate New York!  This Haunted Sanitorium has had a notorious past that will intrigue... and frighten you!
